resources.string: Tap \'Create project\' and bring color to the gray
Every collection starts with a single piece.
The first strokes are down. Fresh projects, endless potential.
The work grows with every session, progress is underway.
The vision is becoming clear. The work finds its rhythm.
The collection nears completion. The details now demand attention.
Only the final touches remain. Refinement stands between work and finish.
Everything stands finished. The miniatures are ready for the next campaign.
One project carries the banner forward: %s is almost done
